title: Project-Based Learning Course in Electrochemical Practical Applications

context.prior_knowledge: Basic chemistry concepts, fundamental electrical circuit principles, and laboratory equipment handling experience
context.additional_context: Current elementary school teachers conduct team projects aimed at developing electrochemistry experiment modules directly applicable in school settings.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the operating principles of electrochemical systems (batteries, electrolysis) and apply key variables (current, voltage, concentration) to experimental design
Learners can collect and analyze electrochemical experiment data using the smart-device-based EC Lab tool and visualize results
Learners can complete a project to develop electrochemical teaching aids that reflect auditory/kinesthetic learning styles and apply them in educational settings
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
